comments:
Build id: I20070228-0930

I have several instances of the following two NPEs in my log.  Not sure what caused them:

eclipse.buildId=I20070228-0930
java.version=1.5.0_03
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -startup D:\Eclipse\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070226.jar
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -startup D:\Eclipse\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070226.jar -data D:\Eclipse\UpdatedSource\plugins

Error
Sun Mar 11 22:00:44 EST 2007
An internal error occurred during: "child count update".

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.viewers.model.TreeModelContentProvider.getPresentationContext(TreeModelContentProvider.java:180)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.viewers.model.ViewerUpdateMonitor.getPresentationContext(ViewerUpdateMonitor.java:147)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.model.elements.ElementContentProvider.retrieveChildCount(ElementContentProvider.java:111)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.model.elements.ElementContentProvider$2.run(ElementContentProvider.java:62)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

Here is a different one:

eclipse.buildId=I20070228-0930
java.version=1.5.0_03
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -startup D:\Eclipse\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070226.jar
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -startup D:\Eclipse\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070226.jar -data D:\Eclipse\UpdatedSource\plugins

Error
Sun Mar 11 22:00:45 EST 2007
Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.debug.ui".

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin$8.done(DebugUIPlugin.java:1064)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobListeners$3.notify(JobListeners.java:39)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobListeners.doNotify(JobListeners.java:112)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobListeners.done(JobListeners.java:152)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.JobManager.endJob(JobManager.java:549)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.WorkerPool.endJob(WorkerPool.java:105)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:74)

Here is a different one:

eclipse.buildId=I20070228-0930
java.version=1.5.0_03
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -startup D:\Eclipse\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070226.jar
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -startup D:\Eclipse\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.equinox.launcher_1.0.0.v20070226.jar -data D:\Eclipse\UpdatedSource\plugins

Error
Sun Mar 11 22:00:45 EST 2007
An internal error occurred during: "Launching New_configuration (2)".

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.sourcelookup.Prompter.handleStatus(Prompter.java:43)
at org.eclipse.debug.core.model.LaunchConfigurationDelegate.saveBeforeLaunch(LaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:241)
at org.eclipse.debug.core.model.LaunchConfigurationDelegate.preLaunchCheck(LaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:195)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:718)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:614)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(DebugUIPlugin.java:880)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin$7.run(DebugUIPlugin.java:1080)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Looks like a workspace shutdown at the time of launching caused these.

The fix to the first NPE is to cancel pending updates in the viewer when the viewer/content provider is disposed (change in ModelContentProvdier). Changes for the next two NPEs require checking for a null debug plug-in (changes to DebugUIPlugin and Prompter).
*** Bug 176000 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
